features: 🔥【Efficient Heat Distribution】Upgraded stove fan, its speed and air volume have been greatly improved. Our fireplace fan made of high-quality anodized aluminum has better thermal conductivity and will not deform or rust even under high temperature for a long time, a perfect companion to every home that has fireplace.

🔥【4 Effective Blades】According to professional testing, 4 blades are the most suitable combination. The wind power of 3 blades fan is not enough. More than 4 blades are too heavy for the motor, causing the blades rotate slowly and easily damage the motor. The base is firm, won't wobble or tip over, even in the highest wind speeds.

🔥【Energy Saving】Thermal drive, no electricity required, saving cost. The fireplace simply pushes heat to the ceiling or around the stove. The stove fan for buddy heater makes full use of the heat generated by the stove to generate electricity and run, distributes the heat to all areas of the room, reduces wood consumption by 28% !

🔥【Safety Design】The bottom of the wood burning stove fan is equipped with a bi-metal safety device. When the surface temperature exceeds 345°C, the front of the heat fan is lifted and STOP WORKING to protect the TEG and motor. The pellet stove fan has a handle, which can avoid burns and convenient when moving.

🔥【Super Quiet 】The only moving parts of the wood stove fan heat powered are 4 blades, the noise is less than 32dB, so quiet that you won't notice when it's running, but you will feel the heat! Say goodbye to horrible noise while enjoying the hot air.

🔥【Ideal Gift】Ecofan size: 18.2 x 18 x 9.5cm. No installation required, suitable for wood, gas and pellet stoves with a surface temperature between 80°C-345°C. (NOTE: Not suitable for stove with insulation and marble on top). Also, it comes with a exquisite package, a great Christmas Gift, New Year Gift for friends and family.

🔥【Working Guide】① The fan for wood stove does not work when lower than 80°C or higher than 345°C. When 80-200°C and 320-345°C, the wind speed is slower. The ideal temperature is 200-320°C, the wind speed and heat dissipation will be perfect. ②When the cocoon fan is running, please do not touch. ③If the highest temperature of your stove top is lower than 100°C/212°F, it is not suitable, the fan will not work effectively.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: If your house has fireplace, you deserve our fireplace fan! - No electricity required, reducing wood usage, saving energy and costs. - Heat fan blades are made of anodized aluminum and will not rust or corrode. - Less than 32 dB, so quiet you won't even realize it's working. - Overheating protection design, thick base can prevent the stove fan from shaking and overturning, safe enough. -Effectively distributes heating air volume to every corner of the room to ensure the health of your family in winter.

Efficient heat distribution, Make your home warm Without such a wood stove fan, you would have to stand near the fireplace or hot radiator, which is impractical, dangerous and takes a long time to feel the heat.

Wood stove fans non electric, Energy saving and efficient With the increasing global energy shortage, environmental pollution problems are more serious, energy prices are also rising. Using the wood stove fan heat powered not only saves energy, protects the environment, but also save money. TIPS: 1. Below 80°C, or higher than 345°C, the wood stove fan does not work. 2. 80-200°C and 320-345°C with slower wind speeds. 3. The ideal temperature is 200-320°C, wind speed and heat dissipation will be perfect.

Prevent overheating A bimetallic strip is integrated into the base of the stove fan and slightly raises the edge of the fan when approaching maximum operating temperature to protect the pellet stove fan motor. Easy to use No electricity required, no assembly required, just place it on a smooth surface of your wood stove (follow instructions in the instructions). When the wood stove fan reaches 80℃, it will start spinning. Safe design The ecofan wood stove fan is equipped with a handle to prevent burns and is easy to move. All you have to do is place it on your wood stove and when it reaches the appropriate temperature, it will radiate heat throughout the room!
A must-have accessory for your fireplace! ! It's beautifully packaged, a perfect gift for friends, family for Christmas and New Year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent addition to our wood stove!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Our neighbors have one like this, and use it all the time. We bought this on their recommendation and love it. I was worried becaused I'd looked at reviews, and one person had video of it not working. I am convinced that it was not used properly. It has to be able to catch the rising hot air to make the fan move. She had it dangling in front of the fire. I have videoed mine, and I slow it down in the video to show that it's blades are moving fast, but on camera it looks like it's not spinning much.The room is normally so chilly (even with the fire) that I need a blanket on my lap. This fan quietly pushes the heat toward you with no noise, no breeze. It doesn't cool the heated air by blowing too hard. It's almost radiant, but not......if that makes sense? Anyway: excellent product for an affordable price. 👌

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product - Runs on heat! No cords or batteries required.
reviews.reviewText: Straight out of the box and onto the fireplace insert. Insanely quiet operation. Assists in distributing the heat. Not sure if its 33% boost, but it definitely helps ! Very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wood stove top fan
reviews.reviewText: Works well. A bit smaller than my other one so make sure you check dinentions before ordering which I failed to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Only use one on our wood burning stove in the kitchen (our only source of heat) Could feel the difference on the other side of the room (large L shaped kitchen). Worked so good we didn't need to burn any wood the next day until the late afternoon. Have one for our living room also, but haven't used yet. Will be getting another one (so we have 2) for our living room as it is heated by wood and or pellets, and the room is nearly 600sqft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not spin- SAVE YOUR MONEY
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I purchased three fans (for my fireplace) to see which one would work better and activate fastest. This is the only one that did not activate at all. The blades are thin and easily bent, then they get stuck. Even when you make sure by hand that's it's able to spin freely, no amount of heat activates it. It's going in the trash! The one I ended up keeping is the LAMA 7 BLADE-that one spun and was so quiet, I didn't even know it was spinning. I can't say anything about the heat transfer but anything is better rhan nothing and if you get too strong a fan you feel a breeze and get smoke.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The fan has been in use for 2 days and is working fine. I am using it on a Regency Steel Wood Burning Stove (which is about 25 years old ). The Dskaoo fan is very quiet and does the job of moving hot air into the room... and does it superbly. I would highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does not work well on a pellet stove - does not get hot enough to activate the fan. Prob works best on a wood-burner or a surface that gets HOT to touch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I know this is designed for the tops of wood and coal stoves but I need something for my wall mount propane heater. I used a double prong peg hook and attached it to the vent slots. It works fantastic. I went through two electric blower motors and was about to give up until I found this option. So far it’s been great.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great addition to our wood stove.
reviews.reviewText: Very quietly and efficiently moves heat around our family room.
This is the second fan we have put on our log burner. Great fan so we bought another. Really helps move the air around just enough.

I bought two of these for our gas fireplace because the fan had gone on ours and they wanted an exorbitant amount to replace it. Like the cost of a new fireplace. So I decided to buy these and give them a try. They work just fine and are very quiet. Great little invention. They circulate the air just fine. They aren't your normal type of fan but they work just fine.
Très satisfait va très bien aucun bruit petite merveille
This item is very light and small. The fan turns easily with little heat on the wood stove, but even when the stove is hot, no air movement can be felt whatsoever. Don't waste your money.
